1565647351_1KUSKrffaR1sfLwxZUXUPshLpKhh5.body:
> [joalmo](#comment_14_15ZG53yDqMJyxRy3jfkC4NGeKapAC5CDrL): You're not supposed to set Tor to "No proxy", you're supposed to add 127.0.0.1 to the "No proxy for:" list on the same menu.

If you do this you can create a breach on Tor browser. Please read this on GitHub to know more:

https://github.com/HelloZeroNet/Documentation/issues/84
